{"step_by_step_thinking": "Document [0] mentions that activation of lysosomal Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide Phosphate (NADPH) oxidase by phorbol ester may result in increase of intralysosomal O2- and H2O2, which are reactive oxygen species.
